President's Speech # Soliman at the centenary of the Faculty of Law and Political Science at Saint Joseph University http://t.co/5CEQQmSKlK #lebanon #presidency
# Sulaiman from St. Joseph University: Rebelled against the winds of fragmentation, discrimination and frustration, and do not allow anyone to change Lebanon's distinctive face in this east. #lebanon
# Solomon of Saint Joseph University: Get out of the sectarian bastions built by warlords and politics, "Do not even destroy it" #lebanon #presidency

# Sulaiman from St. Joseph University :: Hold on to your land because it is the symbol of your steadfastness and presence and do not weaken in front of the desires and temptations of immigration #lebanon #presidency

# Soliman: I invite you to contribute to the building of your state, a country whose officials strive to implement the laws and the constitution and do not strive to not apply them and circumvent them #lebanon

# Solomon from St. Joseph's University: Do not be afraid of dialogue because it is the weapon of the mighty and do not shut your brothers in the homeland because the closure is the weapon of the weak #lebanon

# Solomon from Saint Joseph University: Apply the values ​​of justice and balance and do not be afraid of an oppressor or an oppressor or an oppressor or a transcendent, but fear him #lebanon #presidency

Lebanon is the homeland of freedom and mission. It is not built on the basis of numbers or on the principle of religion, but on the basis of harmony, balance and equality within the formula of coexistence.
No # Christian Lebanon is a guarantee for Christians and no Muslim Lebanon is a guarantee for Muslims; only Lebanon, the state of law and institutions, is the only guarantee for all Lebanese
Only Lebanon, the State of Law and Institutions, Lebanon The shared, free life, the master of all its national territory with its Lebanese army only, is the only guarantee for all.
On the day sworn in, sworn to preserve the Lebanese nation and its independence, territorial integrity, constitution and laws #lebanon #presidency

In compliance with this covenant, I will continue to fulfill my constitutional duty in order to preserve the unity of the nation and its sovereignty on its territory and its internal and external policy and policy

I hope that the Parliament will adopt a parliamentary election law that will guarantee the correctness, fairness and diversity of representation, in accordance with the provisions of Article 24 of the Constitution
A law that provides women with fair representation, gives the right to vote for young people under the age of 18, and the right to run for the age of 21,

I called for the provision of humanitarian assistance to the displaced Syrians, and to work through an international conference to share the burden of the principle of collective responsibility and thinking
..To distribute possible additional numbers on the countries, or the establishment of humanitarian camps inside the Syrian territory away from the areas of clashes
